label: Readability target - minimum
description: Readability result must be great than this value

label: Readability target - maximum
description: Readability result should be lower than this value

label: Long word syllable count
description: Words in text will be flagged as long, if their syllable count is equal to or greater than this value

label: Whitelisted words
description: These words will be excluded from the readability check

label: Blacklisted words
description: These words should never be used

label: Auto-replace terms
description: Pipe-separated list of terms to auto-replace in preflight checks - eg 'replace me|new text'. Autoreplace only runs in the save event handler.

label: Run Preflight on save
description: Set to true and Preflight will run on all saves, and alert users to any errors.

label: Cancel save when Preflight tests fail
description: Set to true and Preflight will cancel the save event, if tests fail and Preflight is set to run on save.

label: Check broken links
description: Set to true and Preflight will check links for errors (40x, 50x, invalid internal links).

label: Hide disabled tests
description: Set to true to hide disabled tests in the Content App.

label: Check readability
description: Set to true and Preflight will analyse text to ensure it falls within the defined readability range (whitelisted terms are ignored).

label: Run autoreplace
description: Set to true and Preflight will apply the replacements mapped in the Auto-replace config.

label: Ensure safe links
description: Set to true and Preflight will check links for potential malware and bad actors.

label: Google SafeBrowsing API key
description: If set, links will be scanned by the SafeBrowsing API to check for malware and unsafe sites
